root.name: activate
tip: Initializes mise in the current shell session

root.name: alias
tip: Manage version aliases

root.name: backends
tip: Manage backends

root.name: bin-paths
tip: List all the active runtime bin paths

root.name: cache
tip: Manage the mise cache

root.name: completion
tip: Generate shell completions

root.name: config
tip: Manage config files

root.name: deactivate
tip: Disable mise for current shell session

root.name: doctor
tip: Check mise installation for possible problems

root.name: en
tip: [experimental] starts a new shell with the mise environment built from the current configuration

root.name: env
tip: Exports env vars to activate mise a single time

root.name: exec
tip: Execute a command with tool(s) set

root.name: fmt
tip: Formats mise.toml

root.name: generate
tip: [experimental] Generate files for various tools/services

root.name: implode
tip: Removes mise CLI and all related data

root.name: install
tip: Install a tool version

root.name: install-into
tip: Install a tool version to a specific path

root.name: latest
tip: Gets the latest available version for a plugin

root.name: link
tip: Symlinks a tool version into mise

root.name: ls
tip: List installed and active tool versions

root.name: ls-remote
tip: List runtime versions available for install

root.name: outdated
tip: Shows outdated tool versions

root.name: plugins
tip: Manage plugins

root.name: prune
tip: Delete unused versions of tools

root.name: registry
tip: List available tools to install

root.name: reshim
tip: Creates new shims based on bin paths from currently installed tools

root.name: run
tip: Run task(s)

root.name: self-update
tip: Updates mise itself

root.name: set
tip: Set environment variables in mise.toml

root.name: settings
tip: Manage settings

root.name: shell
tip: Sets a tool version for the current session

root.name: sync
tip: Synchronize tools from other version managers with mise

root.name: tasks
tip: Manage tasks

root.name: test-tool
tip: Test a tool installs and executes

root.name: tool
tip: Gets information about a tool

root.name: trust
tip: Marks a config file as trusted

root.name: uninstall
tip: Removes installed tool versions

root.name: unset
tip: Remove environment variable(s) from the config file

root.name: unuse
tip: Removes installed tool versions from mise.toml

root.name: upgrade
tip: Upgrades outdated tools

root.name: use
tip: Installs a tool and adds the version to mise.toml

root.name: version
tip: Display the version of mise

root.name: watch
tip: Run task(s) and watch for changes to rerun it

root.name: where
tip: Display the installation path for a tool

root.name: which
tip: Shows the path that a tool's bin points to

root.name: help
tip: Print this message or the help of the given subcommand(s)

options.name: --version
tip: 显示版本信息。

common_options.name: --help
tip: 显示帮助信息。

common_options.name: -C
tip: U: -C, --cd <DIR>
Change directory before running command

common_options.name: -E
tip: U: -E, --env <ENV>
Set the environment for loading `mise.<ENV>.toml`

common_options.name: -j
tip: U: -j, --jobs <JOBS>
How many jobs to run in parallel [default: 8] [env: MISE_JOBS=]

common_options.name: --output
tip: U: --output <OUTPUT>

common_options.name: --raw
tip: Read/write directly to stdin/stdout/stderr instead of by line

common_options.name: --no-config
tip: Do not load any config files

common_options.name: -y
tip: Answer yes to all confirmation prompts

common_options.name: -q
tip: Suppress non-error messages

common_options.name: --silent
tip: Suppress all task output and mise non-error messages

common_options.name: -v
tip: Show extra output (use -vv for even more)

description: mise is a task runner and dev tools manager for any language.
